message: Bob, I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a generous offer considering the inflation, let's end this quickly.
Alice, I think a 55/45 split is fairer, considering your offer in the last round.  Let's end this now before inflation eats away at our gains.
Bob, time is running out. This offer is a compromise to settle before inflation eats further into our potential gains.  Let's be reasonable and wrap this up.
